Title: Apples From the Desert
Writer: Matti Harari, Savyon Liebrecht (short story), Arik Lubetzki
Actors: Moran Rosenblatt, Reymonde Amsallem, Shlomi Koriat, Elisha Banai
Plot: Rebecca Abarnabel, a single daughter born into an Orthodox Jewish family, is tired of the lifestyle that her father, Reuven, has forced upon her. She and her mother, Victoria, go on a life-changing journey between worlds.
